::Kluster::

Kluster nods. "Hmm.. I don't know, it depends on what the father did. 
You speak of your father like he's here on earth. Is he here?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tarantopulous: Yes, that's true. But should one trust his father? 
No matter
> what the consequences? Because in my case, that is indeed 
impossible. But I
> swear, for every shot the Alliance make from right now, I will fire 
back. If
> one of them has to die for hypocrisy, then so be it...
